pros: Great people, good work environment, caring
cons: Salaries could be higher for staff

pros: The clients are great. You will gain a strong bond with them .
cons: If your not the directors favorite 9 out of 10, you will not get extra hours unless very desperate.

pros: great place to work, great benefits and rewarding job.
cons: pay could be better as could some of the management

pros: Amazing organization that cares about the clients and the staff.
cons: Nothing negative to say. Management listens to employees

job_title: Speech Language Pathologist in Stamford, CT
pros: Loving environment, support continuing education, terrific coworkers.
cons: Low pay and few raises.

pros: great staff and clients are so amazing
cons: HR, need higher pay and more appreation

pros: Best company to work for and even a better company to serve your family.  The current CEO has worked fervently to create an atmosphere where you can learn and grow.  From professional training sessions to staff appreciation spa treatments, you are valued.   If you want to enjoy what you do and who you work with then Abilis is the company.
cons: Working in human services don’t pay a lot but the work is rewarding.

pros: Abilis is a great agency to work for.  They provide a personal touch to all areas.  As an employee I’m not just another body but truly cared about by everyone.  Abilis has been a great place for me to grow and build my career.
cons: The agency is growing which is not a negative.  Learning new faces and names in multiple locations.

job_title: Birth to Three Coordinator/Provider in Greenwich, CT
pros: Working with kids and families
cons: The youth management is highly unethical and do not follow mandated birth to three rules which places us in a terrible position. Staff are not well trained or prepared to work with birth to three population and autism population. It's a disservice to the kids and families.  Pay is poor with little room for even cost of living raises. The main concern is saving money, not taking best care of the kids.

review_title: Great mission - with an opportunity to make a difference
pros: Management has changed and with that several new changes for the organization and employees - all for the better.  This includes more training as well as employee recognition initiatives.  Recently there was an increase for hourly employees of more than 20% an hour.
cons: More communication needed to employees as it is a 24 hour, 7 day work environment.

review_title: Poor management and execution of practices
pros:
Helping people with developmental disabilities
Good vacation and sick time
cons:
Offers small to no raises over the past 5 years, at best you can get a 2% raise a year
Disorganized management
Poor upward mobility

pros: The people we serve are so amazing. The management are supportive and work with each staff to achieve their goals. There is room for advancement and I feel others care about my growth.
cons: The salaries could be higher but it is not a get rich quick field.

pros: Abilis has a stellar reputation for providing services to those with disabilities in lower Fairfield County. Under new leadership the organization continues to grow. Staff are friendly and truly care about those we serve.
cons: None come to mind!

pros: I am a full-time employee, working at Abilis for 5 years. Abilis is a company with great management and  has many opportunities for growth. The stuff is friendly and professional. HRs are effective and responsive.
cons: Really got no major concern to write about

pros: Work can be very fulfilling.
cons: Low pay, no raises for past three years, ineffectual management. Very 'upstairs / downstairs' mindset .

pros: There are a lot of unique clients and employees to work with.
cons: Job descriptions are constantly changing without appropriate compensation

pros: Great management vision and overall company culture with a team composed of genuine and smart people to work with. Great culture that fosters innovation and personal development
cons: Can't see any cons at the moment

cons: None benefits plan, or employee’s incentives
